mixed-citation.article-title: Atlas of European millipedes 3: Order Chordeumatida (Class Diplopoda)

tp:treatment-sec.p: AT, CH , CZ, DE, FR-FRA, HU, LU, PL, SK.
A eurytopic species. Found in forests at 430–2250 m a.s.l. in Switzerland ; most common in coniferous, broad-leaved and mixed forests, under bark, litter and stones; also in caves.

Records of this species from BH, HR, IT-ITA and SI were referred to other species by Antić & Akkari (2020) . Records from LU, as well as some (but far from all) records from CZ are dubious ( Antić & Akkari 2020 ). Meyer & Singer (1997) studied populations and phenology of this species.
